source_text: $50 per tonne of copper metals produced up to a total of 20,000 tonnes of copper metal and a 1% NSR above 20,000 tonnes of copper; and
additional_details: Royalty applies to copper production above 20,000 tonnes. Royalty is paid by Lord Resources Limited (the Company) to Kumarina Resources Pty Ltd (former owner of the Tenement E52/2274).
